title: Unzué Sees 5-year Lifeline from Movistar: Can Spain’s Lone WorldTour Squad Challenge the Super Teams?
content:
With backing through 2029, can Team Movistar regain its past glory and challenge the mega-budget squads at the grand tours?

Read the full article at Unzué Sees 5-year Lifeline from Movistar: Can Spain’s Lone WorldTour Squad Challenge the Super Teams? on Velo.
author: ahood
